titleinfo.title: Indians for Indians Radio Show, April 5, 1949

mods.tableOfContents: Jimmie Quoetone -Christian life and Kiowa prayer Age 90, Kiowa, Daughter: Mrs. Ted Ware, Box 214, Anadarko, Oklahoma. Speech: Briefly about his life from the time he was a small boy up to the time he became a Christian. (After break) He says a prayer.
mods.note: When citing recordings from this collection, please use the following: Indians for Indians Radio Show. Western History Collections, University of Oklahoma Libraries.
